Sentencas: SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) are a promising technology for electric power generation, because of their high efficiency and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: Relative to more mature technologies, they appear very competitive starting from small-scale applications.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: The aim of this study is to map SOFC performances varying fuel composition, reproducing gases of technical interest (biomass air and oxy-gasification, water and carbon dioxide co-electrolysis, steam methane reforming) and to provide a forecasting tool to predict performance upon the fuel composition occurring in any application.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: Therefore, at first commercial SOFC are tested using several fuel gas mixtures produced by means of the chosen technologies (H-2, CO, CH4 molar fractions ranges are respectively 8-50%, 0-42%, 1-8%).
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: Secondly, experimental data are used to build a mathematical tool to predict SOFC characteristic curve from the fuel composition.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: This result is interesting from the point of view of system-level modelling, because it allows characterizing commercial SOFCs performances in many technical applications.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition
Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition

Sentencas: Because of its accuracy, the model can be implemented to assess properly SOFC performance as a consequence of any particular hybridization, whereas fuel composition falls into the range already defined.
Titulo: Performance characterization and modelling of syngas-fed SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) varying fuel composition
